# rcoingecko <img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" height="139" />

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/rcoingecko)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=rcoingecko)
<!-- badges: end -->

R Package for Querying Cryptocurrency Data from the [CoinGecko API](https://www.coingecko.com/api/documentations/v3)

--------

## Installation

You can install the development version of rcoingecko from [GitHub](https://github.com/southernt/rcoingecko) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("southernt/rcoingecko")
```

## Examples

```{r example}
library(rcoingecko)
```

Query available cryptocurrencies and quote crypto/fiat currencies
```{r coins_vs_currencies, message = FALSE}
## table
cg_supported_coins()

## vector
cg_supported_vs_currencies()
```

Query available exchanges.
```{r exchanges, message = FALSE}
cg_exchanges()
```

Query available crytocurrency/blockchain platforms.
```{r asset_platforms, message = FALSE}
cg_asset_platforms()
```

Query crytocurrency categories.
```{r categories, message = FALSE}
cg_categories()
```

Plot crytocurrency/blockchain platform market proportion.
```{r crypto_platforms, message = FALSE}
gg_crypto_platform_prop()
```


Query current crytocurrency market summary.
```{r coin_markets_summ, message = FALSE}
cg_coin_markets_summ()
```



```{r coin_snapshot, message = FALSE, eval = FALSE, include = FALSE}
# Query coin summary snapshot
# cg_coin_snapshot(coin = "bitcoin")
```


```{r stablecoins, message = FALSE}
gg_stablecoins_pie()
```
